summary: This is a Bureau of Prisons (BOP) training completion report for the Special Housing Unit (SHU), listing a correctional services employee's course completion. It appears to be an administrative document related to BOP staff training records.

persons.name: Thomas, Michael
persons.context: BOP employee listed as having completed training; appears in the report with work title and email address.

events.title: Training Completion
events.description: Michael Thomas completed training as recorded in this BOP report.

keyFacts: Document is a Bureau of Prisons training completion report for the Special Housing Unit (SHU).
Lists Michael Thomas as a Warehouse Worker Foreman with a BOP email address.
Report run date is June 9, 2021, but includes training data from 2015.
Document is marked as containing Sensitive but not Classified information for official use only.
Appears to be an administrative record rather than directly related to Epstein case events.
